about_the_game:
Halloween Gallery

This Halloween-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is eerie, kooky or otherwise spooky!


Play this seasonal gallery if you dare!

Contents

The Halloween gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Dracula
  • Ghost
  • Graveyard
  • Grim Reaper
  • Haunted House
  • Headless Horseman
  • Mummy
  • Scarecrow
  • Skeleton
  • Undead Rising
  • Witch
  • Pumpkin
  • Crystal Ball
  • Tombstone
  • Owl
  • Angry Candle
  • Gargoyle
  • Werewolf
  • Candy
  • Wendigo
  • Black Cat

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Halloween Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Halloween-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is eerie, kooky or otherwise spooky! Play this seasonal gallery if you dare!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
